Uber | San Francisco | Fulltime | Android | iOS

Interested in a highly leveraged, collaborative engineering role at the heart of Uber's core product? Awesome. We are hiring on the Driver Platform team at Uber. Our mission is to transform Uber's Driver application into a world class engineering platform that's easy to build on and impossible to break.

This is a senior role that requires thinking holistically about application development and solving hard architectural problems unique to Uber's scale. Most qualified candidates will have >2 years experience.

If you're interested, please email gluck@uber.com
